TopicTitle: Will the Magic Boulder return in KSP 2?

Articles.Content:
KSP 2 is going to be a fantastic game.

I do have a small question, though. Will the Magic Boulder - the easter egg which disappeared after 0.19 - return in the sequel?

After all, the only reason why it disappeared was due to engine limitations. KSP 2 will be using a new engine in a newer version of Unity, which means that Star Theory can restore the beloved boulder back to where it should be - in orbit around Ike.

Even if they don't restore the Magic Boulder itself, there's still a chance that they can add the Magic Boulderoids (the glowing asteroids added in 1.3.3) instead.
maybe they could have a kopernicus type unselectable moon  which you can see in orbit of ike sometimes
